name: Primal Adventure
description:
...Is a short Adventure Story Game in which you help your Tribe Members, by gathering resources and completing Minigames. 




Controls: (controller support) 
- Move - W, A, S, D / Left Stick  
- Interact - E / Button West
- PauseMenu - Escape / Select - 


Sounds by;
Epidemic Sounds / We Love Indies





1. Download .zip
2. Unpack .zip
3. Run the game
